record.name: Initialize assignment group and assignee for request task

rule.ruleDesc: Request Task Assignment Rule for Purchase category
rule.condition: same(assigned.group in $L.file, NULL) and (not (same(category in $L.file, NULL)) and category in $L.file="Purchase")
rule.conditionDesc: ( Assigned Group in CurrentRecord = NULL AND ( Category in CurrentRecord != NULL AND Category in CurrentRecord = "Purchase"))
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Assigned Group">assigned.group</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">NULL</Value></condition><collection logical="AND" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Category">category</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType="string">NULL</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Category">category</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">Purchase</Value></condition></collection></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Request Task Assignment Rule for Purchase category (when ( Assigned Group in CurrentRecord = NULL AND ( Category in CurrentRecord != NULL AND Category in CurrentRecord = "Purchase")))

rule.ruleDesc: Request Task Assignment Rule for Non-Purchase category
rule.condition: same(assigned.group in $L.file, NULL) and not ((not (same(category in $L.file, NULL)) and category in $L.file="Purchase"))
rule.conditionDesc: ( Assigned Group in CurrentRecord = NULL AND not ( Category in CurrentRecord != NULL AND Category in CurrentRecord = "Purchase"))
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Assigned Group">assigned.group</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">NULL</Value></condition><collection logical="AND" negate="true"><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Category">category</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType="string">NULL</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Category">category</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">Purchase</Value></condition></collection></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Request Task Assignment Rule for Non-Purchase category (when ( Assigned Group in CurrentRecord = NULL AND not ( Category in CurrentRecord != NULL AND Category in CurrentRecord = "Purchase")))
